product.name: Blue Shower Curtain Floral Cotton Linen Cottagecore Shower Curtain for Bathroom 72" W x 72" L
product.bullet_points:
• Cotton and Linen Blend
• FEATURES: Blue floral pattern brings vitality to your bathroom.
• MATERIAL: Premium cotton and linen blend fabric, soft and skin-friendly, lightweight and durable.
• INSTALLATION: Paired with 12 metal rust-proof hook holes and 12 white hooks.
• CARE: Machine washable in cold water, tumble dry low, low iron, do not bleach.
• Cotton material is recommended to be used with liner
